data.name: Ectolibrium Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
25 unique tracks by the awesome Blunt Weapon Damage. This soundtrack includes the full-length tracks from Ectolibrium Episode One, plus a number of shorter interstitial pieces which preview future content in the Ectoverse. This soundtrack will be expanded over time. For now, it's just an additional way of supporting Ectolibrium's development, for those so inclined!

Tracks:

1. Beyond Warmoon.mp3, 00:56
2. Biomade Anti-Berserk.mp3, 07:59
3. Eld Descends.mp3, 04:09
4. Elementar Spiritus.mp3, 10:23
5. Execute Delusion Device.mp3, 02:19
6. Existence Reflux.mp3, 03:26
7. Harriage Decomposition Flavor.mp3, 10:23
8. Hypnofreud Excaliburnage.mp3, 01:58
9. Lab Chronismus.mp3, 00:45
10. Lifeform Mistaker.mp3, 00:51
11. Mezmerizing Burden.mp3, 07:47
12. Overload Extraordinaire.mp3, 06:23
13. Raunchy Road to Nintendo.mp3, 01:36
14. Return to Wild Herbert West.mp3, 01:49
15. Saturn Overload.mp3, 01:44
16. Spiritius Machinarium.mp3, 00:54
17. Straight Down The Ectochamber.mp3, 01:39
18. Symphony of the Hidden.mp3, 01:12
19. Take Em Out.mp3, 01:04
20. Tangarine Euphratensis Deux.mp3, 07:49
21. Teverax Tunnel Systis.mp3, 09:29
22. The Rotoric Mantra.mp3, 09:35
23. Valkyrenzero Barium.mp3, 00:47
24. Widerstand Ghostemblem.mp3, 07:11
25. Wilderness Uncompus.mp3, 07:59

data.short_description: The soundtrack for Ectolibrium Episode One, plus a number of additional experimental/WIP tracks which preview future content in the Ectoverse. This soundtrack will be expanded overtime. For now, it's just an additional way of supporting Ectolibrium's development, for those so inclined!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: This is a soundtrack, not a game. You can probably run it.
